name: Death Statues Mod
description:
Spawns a player-like statue entity that wears the same armor as you and has items from both of your hands. 
It can be spawned by either placing down a statue base block, when you press [R] on your keyboard, or by dying.
You can also place down a more block-like Death Statue Block on top of the base block.
Both blocks and the entity will allow you to right click on them to access the statue's storage.
There isn't a way to access the armor slots yet because it essentially duplicates the items, so I need to fix that.
